results.description: Watch highlights as Nicky Maynard scores a late winner to give League Two Mansfield victory over non-league Chorley and book a place in the FA Cup second round.
results.title: FA Cup: Mansfield Town 1-0 Chorley highlights

results.description: Nicky Maynard scores a late winner as League Two Mansfield claim a narrow victory over National League part-timers Chorley to reach the second round of the FA Cup.
results.title: Mansfield Town 1-0 Chorley

results.description: Two goals in nine minutes late in the game sees in-form Colchester United win at Mansfield Town.
results.title: Mansfield Town 2-3 Colchester United

results.description: Andy Cook and Mal Benning return to haunt their former club as they help Mansfield inflict a fifth straight defeat on Walsall.
results.title: Walsall 1-2 Mansfield Town

results.description: Forest Green Rovers and Mansfield Town are both fined £1,000 by the FA after an incident at the end of their League Two game.
results.title: Forest Green Rovers & Mansfield Town each fined £1,000 for post-match incident

results.description: Salford score two second-half goals to beat Mansfield Town 2-1 in their first visit to Field Mill.
results.title: Mansfield Town 1-2 Salford City

results.description: Substitute Andy Cook makes a stunning impact with a second-half double to earn Mansfield a draw at Forest Green.
results.title: Forest Green Rovers 2-2 Mansfield Town

results.description: Boss Dino Maamria is "bemused" as Oldham see two players sent off for fouls in the same passage of play and then lose 6-1.
results.title: Mansfield Town 6-1 Oldham Athletic: Dino Maamria 'bemused' at double sending off

results.description: Krystian Pearce scores in stoppage time to give 10-man Mansfield victory at Grimsby.
results.title: Grimsby Town 0-1 Mansfield Town

results.description: Mansfield's miserable start to the season continues as they are beaten at home by a 30-yard stunner from Plymouth's Conor Grant.
results.title: Mansfield Town 0-1 Plymouth Argyle

results.description: Nathan Smith's last-minute equaliser extends Port Vale's unbeaten home start to the League Two season as they draw with Mansfield.
results.title: Port Vale 2-2 Mansfield Town

results.description: Cambridge United hit four late goals in the final 16 minutes to sink 10-man Mansfield Town at Field Mill.
results.title: Mansfield Town 0-4 Cambridge United

results.description: Bez Lubala makes up for a first-half penalty miss with the winning goal against Mansfield.
results.title: Crawley Town 1-0 Mansfield Town

results.description: Mansfield pick up their first home win of the League Two campaign with a 2-0 victory over rock-bottom Scunthorpe United.
results.title: Mansfield Town 2-0 Scunthorpe United

results.description: Mansfield midfielder Dion Donohue has his contract terminated following a disciplinary investigation by the club.
results.title: Dion Donohue: Mansfield Town midfielder's contract terminated after disciplinary investigation

results.description: Mansfield sign defender Conor Shaughnessy on a season-long loan from Championship side Leeds United.
results.title: Conor Shaughnessy: Mansfield Town sign Leeds United defender

thumbnail.altText: Conor Shaughnessy in action for Hearts
Conor Shaughnessy in action for Hearts
Conor Shaughnessy in action for Hearts
Conor Shaughnessy in action for Hearts

results.description: Exeter maintain their unbeaten run at the top of League Two thanks to a 1-0 victory at home to Mansfield Town.
results.title: Exeter City 1-0 Mansfield Town

results.description: West Ham United forward Oladapo Afolayan joins League Two club Mansfield Town on a half-season loan deal.
results.shortTitle: West Ham loan Afolayan to Mansfield
results.title: Oladapo Afolayan: Mansfield Town sign West Ham United forward on loan

results.description: Arsenal U21s draw their opening EFL Trophy group match at Northampton 1-1 but lose the resulting penalty shootout.
results.shortTitle: Arsenal U21s lose EFL Trophy opener on penalties
results.title: EFL Trophy: Arsenal U21s lose opener on penalties as Everton U21s win bonus point

results.description: Mansfield are still looking for their first home win of the season following a goalless draw with Stevenage.
results.title: Mansfield Town 0-0 Stevenage
